price: Moses said, “O Pharaoh, I am a messenger from the Lord of the worlds.
arabic: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ يَٰفِرۡعَوۡنُ إِنِّي رَسُولٞ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
